sentence: Lindenbaum's name appears as the third signature on the original complaint in the lawsuit alleging voter suppression in the race that saw then-Republican Secretary of State Brian Kemp defeat Abrams by 55,000 votes statewide in the governor's race.
author: Guy Benson
title: Surprise: Biden Nominates Conspiratorial Election Truther to Oversee US Elections

sentence: Georgia GOP candidate David Perdue promised to call a special session of the legislature to consider an abortion ban, while incumbent Republican Brian Kemp said he would fight for the strongest antiabortion law in the country.
author: Jennifer Calfas
title: States Move to Restrict or Protect Abortion Rights After Leak of Draft Opinion Overturning Roe v. Wade

author: Jordan Mendoza
title: Here's what US governors said after bombshell Supreme Court abortion opinion leaked
